overview:
Leon Suh is Poweritâ€™s Chief Financial Officer. Leon leads finance, administration, IT, human resources and customer operations for Powerit. Leon brings over 18 years of financial, strategic planning, M&A and operational management experience. Previous to Powerit, Leon held financial leadership positions at DataChannel, Inc., AT&T Wireless and The Cobalt Group, Inc..

Leon began his career as an auditor with Ernst & Young LLP. He holds a bachelor’s degree in business administration from the University of Washington and a masters degree in business administration from Seattle University and is an inactive certified public accountant in Washington state.
